hotel_name: La Bastide du Moulin - Mont St Michel
description: Just 5 km from Mont Saint-Michel, La Bastide du Moulin is located in the countryside of Moidrey. Guests can relax on the terrace, by the garden, or rent the bicycles to discover the area. The rooms at La Bastide du Moulin are elegantly decorated with wooden furniture. Some of the rooms have exposed wooden beams and stone walls. All rooms are located on the garden side. Some are also suitable for guests with reduced mobility. The self-catering apartment is separate and includes a kitchen where guests can prepare their own meals. A continental breakfast is served each morning in the dining room. Shops, bars and restaurants can be found a 2-minute drive away. Excursions can be organised in the surroundings and the owner is happy to give advice on activities to do in the area. There is a horse riding centre 300 m from the property. Bicycle storage is available on site and the beaches are a 30-minute drive away. A hiking trail is just 100 m from the property.   Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.5 for a two-person trip.    La Bastide du Moulin - Mont St Michel has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 26 Aug 2013.

description: Located 50 m from the beach, Grand Hôtel de Courtoisville - Piscine & Spa, The Originals Relais (Relais du Silence) features a heated indoor swimming pool equipped with a hydrotherapy massage system. Quiet and bright, our rooms have all the comforts necessary for a peaceful sleep. The bathrooms have a bathtub or shower, a hair dryer and Phytomer products. For your pleasure, we also provide bathrobes, slippers and a Nespresso coffee machine. Massages can be requested at a surcharge. description: This former 18th-century post office is now a charming hotel located in one of Bayeux’s oldest quarters. It offers 24-hour reception and is just 400 m from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in each soundproofed room. All rooms are light and spacious and have their own bathroom with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning. The hotel’s restaurant serves creative French cuisine. After dinner, guests can relax with a drink of Calvados and listen to some music by the fireplace in the lounge bar. The staff at Le Lion D’or can help arrange local excursions through their concierge service. Massage treatments can be arranged near the property upon request. This 18th-century hotel is situated in the heart of Bayeux. It is set back from the road, ensuring guests the calmness of the countryside. Free Wi-Fi access is available for 1 device per room. The rooms at the Hotel d'Argouges are divided between three buildings offering a soothing view of the garden or the yard. It features satellite TV and a private bathroom. Breakfast is served in the living room which features preserved floorboards, woodwork, a fireplace and a period mirror. When the weather is fine enough, it can also be enjoyed in the hotel's lush garden. Being mostly spared by the ravages of WWII, Bayeux has preserved its heritage and rich architecture. Guests can discover the famous Tapisserie of Queen Mathilde, Notre-Dame cathedral, Baron Gerard's museum, and the memorial of the Battle of Normandy. description: This 19th-century building with its striking façade is the home of the Crowne Plaza Paris République, a 4-star hotel situated at Place de la République. “When elegance and modernity meet an old mansion…” The Urban Hotel is originally the home of a former spinner, Monsieur Pouillet, at the time when Lille and its metropolis prospered thanks to the weaving industry. Dating from 1880, it continues to shine as a hotel complex with its Napoleon III style, marble floors and original mouldings. Located 2 km from the centre, 1.4 km from the Grand Palais and 2.5 km from Old Lille, take advantage of our free parking to walk, by metro (Porte de Valencienne 4 minutes, directly connecting Lille-Europe and Lille-Flandres stations) or by bike thanks to the V'lille station, which is also less than 4 minutes away. Our rooms, renovated in 2022, invite you to a moment of rest after a day of tourism or work & before a tasty breakfast where we prefer local products. Our rooms will seduce you with their sleek design as well as their comfort and amenities. The Rococo Restaurant offers creative cuisine based on local products offered by our Chef Jean-François and his team. On sunny days, relax in the sun on our terrace or in our garden.    Best Western Urban Hotel has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 4 May 2010.  Hotel chain/brand: Best Western

Conveniently situated near the A5 motorway, this hotel is 2.5 km from Wasserpak Rulantica and 4 km from the Europa-Park. The Sun Parc Hotel offers free WiFi and is giving every guest who visits us in November-July or in September one free day ticket for the shuttle to and from Rulantica and Europa-Park. The bus stop is only 150 m away from the Sun Parc Hotel. All rooms at the Sun Parc Ringsheim feature classic décor, a TV and a private bathroom with shower. A large breakfast buffet is served each morning. Offering a family-oriented and friendly service, the Sun Parc Hotel is an ideal base for visiting the nearby Black Forest or the Alsace region of France. It is just 25 km from Freiburg and 80 km from Strasbourg. Ringsheim Train Station is just 200 m from the Sun Parc Hotel.   Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip.    Hotel SunParc - SHUTTLE zum Europa-Park Rust 4km & Rulantica 2km has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 1 Feb 2010.

hotel_name: Ibis Colmar Est - Hotel Restaurant en Alsace
description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Ibis Colmar Est - Hotel Restaurant en Alsace! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. The ibis Colmar East is located 5 km from the Alsace Wine Trail and 10 km from Kaysersberg, Riquewihr and Eguisheim. Wi-Fi is free of charge in the entire property. The 86 rooms are comfortable and all have en suite facilities with a bath tub. The hotel also features an Alsatian brasserie, WinStub, a terrace, a free car park and secure car spaces. A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. The property is a boutique hotel. Ironing facilities and hairdryers are available upon request. The property is a 5 minute drive from the old city centre of Colmar, wander through the Petite Venise area, visit the toy museum or admire the Isenheim Altarpiece at the Unterlinden Museum.    Ibis Colmar Est - Hotel Restaurant en Alsace has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 8 Jun 2010.  Hotel chain/brand: ibis

description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Restaurant Le Maréchal - Les Collectionneurs! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Constructed in 1565 on the city’s original fortified walls, this 4-star hotel is located in the picturesque quarter of Colmar known as Little Venice.  Hostellerie Le Maréchal is set on the canal and is 700 m from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains. Guestrooms and suites are air-conditioned and decorated with brocades and antique furniture. Most rooms overlook the canal, and all are en suite with free WiFi internet access. The restaurant, A l’Echevin, serves traditional and regional gourmet cuisine using regional produce. In the summer months, guests are invited to eat on the terrace by the river. The reception desk at Hostellerie Le Maréchal is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are available in the lobby area. The hotel is located 1.4 km from Colmar Train Station and public parking can be found in the surrounding area.   This is our guests' favourite part of Colmar, according to independent reviews. hotel_name: Les Appartements de Home Petite Venise
description: Located in the ‘Little Venice’ district of Colmar, Home Petite Venise offers self-catering apartments. The building dates back to the 18th-Century and the train station is only 1 km away. Accessed by stairs, all apartments feature a living room with a flat-screen TV, wooden flooring and a bathroom, while some have a view of the canal and a washing machine. The kitchen includes a microwave and refrigerator. Grocery shops and restaurants can be found within walking distance and the Christmas markets take place in the area. Meals and a breakfast kit can be delivered on request. Free WiFi access is available and Mulhouse Airport is 50 km away.   This is our guests' favourite part of Colmar, according to independent reviews.   Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.9 for a two-person trip. Free Wi-Fi access is provided and there is private parking on site, available at a surcharge. The apartment features high ceilings and a decorative marble fireplace. There is a living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV. The bathroom is fitted with a shower. The equipped, separate kitchen area includes a refrigerator, a dishwasher, an electric kettle and a microwave. A Nespresso coffee machine is available and capsules can be purchased on site. L’Annexe du 11 C is ideally located for visiting Besançon, with Saint-Jean Cathedral 260 m away and the Vauban Citadel at 750 m. La Mouillère Train Station is a 15-minute walk away. Additional features include a washing machine, hot plates and a printer available upon request. Calls towards France and 104 countries on landlines included.    L'Annexe du 11 C has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 9 Aug 2013.

This Hotel Mercure is situated in the city centre of Besancon in the casino garden on the Doubs River and opposite the Micaud Park. There are 91 air-conditioned guestrooms, 78 which are non-smoking, equipped with clean, private bathrooms and flat screen satellite TV. The hotel restaurant, Le Vesontio, serves traditional cuisine and offers a splendid view of the casino gardens. L’Instant, the hotel bar, is open until 23:00. There is a casino, a fitness centre and a karaoke bar within 3 km from the hotel.   Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip. hotel_name: Hotel Campanile Besançon Nord Ecole Valentin
description: The Campanile Besançon Valentin is located near the A36 motorway (exit Saint Claude) and 5.8 km from Besançon and Besançon Viotte TGV Station. It offers guestrooms with free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at the Campanile are equipped with flat-screen TVs with Canal+ channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Each includes a private bathroom, and family rooms are also available. Guests can enjoy traditional French cuisine in the on-site restaurant, followed by a drink in the private bar. The hotel also provides a night porter. Besançon, a hilly town with twisting streets dominated by a citadel, is known for its delightful setting and fine parks. The hotel is located between the new TGV station and the town centre.   Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.0 for a two-person trip. Situated a few steps from the Besançon train station and just 5 minutes from the city centre, the Hotel Foch offers quality comfort at an affordable price. description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Set in the heart of the historic centre of Dijon, Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs is 300 m from Palais des Ducs de Bourgogne. Free WiFi in all rooms and all public areas of the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms at Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs have a private bathroom and flat screen TV. Rooms offer views over the city of Dijon, the interior garden or Gothic courtyard or over rue Sainte Anne. Restaurant La Closerie serves inventive, seasonal gourmet cuisine, complemented by an excellent wine list featuring many local wines. La Closerie offers elegant dining in a setting dating back to the 17th century, with original floortiles, exposed beams and rustic stonework, yet infused with contemporary touches. In the summertime, lunch and dinner can be served in the hotel's private garden. A full buffet breakfast is served daily. Naturopathic massage treatments are available at the hotel, for a surcharge. Guests at Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs can explore the historical centre, its quaint streets and squares, while visiting Les Halles market, a wide variety of museums and original boutiques and shops. description: Novotel Lyon Gerland Musée des Confluences is located in Lyon, on the banks of Rhône River, 50 m from the Halle Tony Garnier concert venue, a 5-minute walk from the Musée des Confluences and a 6-minute tram ride from the shopping centre. Featuring a grand piano, HOTEL C2, located in the Pierre Puget courtyard in Marseille, is a 19th-century private mansion converted into a hotel. description: InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu is set in a superb 18th century building in the historic quarter of Marseille, 350 m from the Old Port. WiFi access is available. With 194 rooms and suites, some with landmark views and private terraces, the hotel features contemporary, elegant decor, complementing its historical features. The hotel has 2 gourmet restaurants onsite - La Brasserie Les Fenêtres and Le Restaurant Gastronomique Alcyone. Le Capain Bar offers an array of cocktails prepared by specialists. The hotel’s own relaxation area features a Clarins spa with saunas, hammams, sunbeds, a gym and an indoor pool. The spa is available to hotel guests for an extra charge. The hotel du Palais des Papes is located in Avignon, in front of the Pope Palace. It stands on 3 floors and benefits from a completely pedestrian area. The hotel du Palais des Papes is equipped with comfortable rooms offering a wonderful view on either the Palais des Papes, or on the Horloge Square. Each room offers air conditioning and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. This 18-century coaching inn, now a boutique hotel, is located in Nîmes, hidden in a secret flowered garden. It offers an outdoor pool surrounded by a Mediterranean-style garden with olive, orange and palm trees as well as a marble fountain. Each air-conditioned room at the Jardins Secrets features a bathtub surrounded by a silk curtain, and the authentic period décor bedrooms have a beautiful view of either the garden, swimming pool, or the cloister. A traditional cloister leads into the luxurious lounges, where guests are invited to have a drink in the Napoleon III bar. In winter, you can relax by the fireplace. At Source des Secrets Spa guests can indulge in beauty treatments. There is a shop available selling local products. Jardins Secrets is a peaceful and charming hideaway in the heart of the Roman city, with its famous amphitheatre Les Arènes, and monument La Maison Carrée.   This is our guests' favourite part of Nîmes, according to independent reviews.   Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.2 for a two-person trip. Maison Albar Hotels L’Imperator is a luxury hotel located in the city of Nimes. Bordering the Jardin de la Fontaine, L'Imperator is less than five minutes’ walk from the Maison Carrée Roman temple and the Carrée d'Art museum. Past guests of this historic hotel include Ava Gardner, Ernest Hemingway, and Torero El Cordobes. Rooms are in a Mediterranean style with natural stone, marble and wood. Equipped with a walk-in shower, each room also has a Smart TV with ChromeCast so you can view and share your personal content. Some rooms overlook the hotel gardens. L'Imperator boasts a 24/7 reception desk, and has baby equipment and services for children. The Spa by CODAGE offers an indoor and outdoor pool, a Jacuzzi, a sensory shower and a hammam, as well as a full range of massages. L’Imperator is the home of Pierre Gagnaire, an award-winning chef elected best chef in the world by his peers, and the two onsite restaurants offer guests 2 different gastronomic experiences. The Duende gourmet restaurant is the place to experience extraordinary flavours. L'Impé brasserie, situated on the Imperator’s inner patio in the shade of a Gingko Biloba tree, serves a generous and refined cuisine highlighting local produce. The Hemingway Bar offers cocktails in a relaxed setting. A continental breakfast is served daily, or you can enjoy breakfast in your room. A private, on-site car park is available upon reservation. Nimes TGV Train Station is less than 2 km from L'Imperator.   This is our guests' favourite part of Nîmes, according to independent reviews.   Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.5 for a two-person trip.    Maison Albar Hotels L’Imperator has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 8 Jul 2010.

The Grand Hôtel de Nîmes is a hotel-restaurant-convention hall complex that welcomes you in Nîmes, only 3 km from the Arena. Located in a hotel park planted with palm trees and oleanders, this fully renovated hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool reserved exclusively for hotel guests, games for children, a billiard table, a table soccer ... The very spacious rooms are equipped with a free high speed fiber Wifi connection and a large flat screen TV with international channels. A welcome coffee/tea and a bottle of mineral water are provided free of charge in your room. The air conditioning of last generation will offer you an optimal comfort to relax you during the hot Provencal days.The private bathrooms are all equipped with a bathtub and separate toilet. Our American Breakfast Buffet is a delight for our guests and contributes to the reputation of the Grand Hotel de Nimes. During your stay, you can enjoy our Cosy and Luxurious Bar Lounge, open late at night and reserved for hotel guests only. A large selection of the best wines, rums and prestigious whiskies are at your disposal, not forgetting our Cigar Cellar where you can enjoy Cohiba, Partagas, Romeo & Juliette or Monte Cristo. In summer, numerous activities are offered to you on the spot thanks to the innumerable offers of our Partners. You will also be able to enjoy our restaurant "Le Chat Noir", rated 4.5/5 on Tripadvisor. Your meal will be served on the Flowered Terrace during the summer days and evenings . In winter, you will enjoy our indoor restaurant with its cozy setting and warm decoration. You will benefit from a Reception open 24 hours a day, a free parking in front of the hotel or a paying and secured parking with direct access inside the hotel. Ideally located 1 km from the freeway, the Grand Hôtel de Nîmes welcomes you 1.5 km from the Nîmes Exhibition Center, 5 km from the Vacquerolles and Nimes Campagne golf courses. Less than 40 km away, you can visit the Pont du Gard, Avignon, Arles, Aigues-Mortes or enjoy our beautiful beaches. We speak French, English, Italian and Spanish. We look forward to welcoming you. hotel_name: Logis Le Nid du Pont de Gau
description: In this unspoiled natural setting of the Camargue, Le Nid du Pont de Gau offers you a warm welcome in its cozy accommodation. Located 4 km from the village of Saintes Maries de la Mer and just 2 steps from the ornithological park, our family and friendly establishment is located in the middle of birds and ponds. Just like at home, you will appreciate the comfort of our fully equipped apartments with a natural and relaxing atmosphere. For an unusual and unforgettable stay, our Gypsy Caravan "Ginès" offers an atypical and colorful space with all mod cons where you will feel like a traveler. You can enjoy our landscaped garden during the day in the shade of the fig trees and in the evening while admiring the flight of pink flamingos. After your getaways, you will be delighted to refresh yourself on the terrace of our café around a local drink, a snack or an ice cream in a friendly atmosphere. During your stay, we invite you to rest and relax as well as to explore our beautiful Camargue. We love our region and our traditions. We are present and available if you want advice, we will be happy to share our good addresses and tips.   Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip.    Logis Le Nid du Pont de Gau has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 14 Jun 2014.  Hotel chain/brand: Logis Hôtels

Le Mas de Cocagne features a seasonal heated outdoor swimming pool and a garden. It is located at the entrance of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, just 800 m from the sandy beaches and the town centre. Le Mas de Cocagne rooms and suites have a blend of contemporary and traditional Camargue region décor. They feature air conditioning and free WiFi access. Each room has a private bathroom and views over the gardens, the marshes or the swimming pool. A buffet breakfast is served daily beside the pool. Guests can relax in the seasonal hot tub or enjoy various massages on site, upon reservation only. Guests can explore the historical village of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, with its fortified church. Also take advantage of the outdoor activities on offer in the countryside surrounding Le Mas de Cocagne. These include horse riding, cycling and boat trips. description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Auberge Cavaliere du Pont des Bannes! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Guests also have access to free WiFi. Guest rooms are equipped with a private terrace from which guests can admire the surroundings. They also have a private bathroom, a TV and a minibar. ibis Carcassonne Centre is ideally located 1 km from Carcassonne's Train Station and only 800 m from the medieval heart of the city. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned guest rooms with free WiFi. A flat-screen satellite TV and a desk are provided in each guest room. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and toiletries. A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. A snack bar provides food throughout the day. Part of the 17th-century Canal du Midi is 500 m from the hotel and Jean Alary Theatre, the Fine Arts Museum and Comtal Castle are all within a 10-minute walk. Just 5 minutes walking distance from the Biarritz beaches, sits Hotel Edouard VII, a 19th-century residence that combines the charm of yesterday and the comfort of today. This unique residence has a rich history based on its past residents. It was once the home of the Mayor of Biarritz. It was also the place Napoleon III used to receive medical care on his visits to the region. Guestrooms are spacious and feature a refined and elegant décor. All are air-conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with private bathrooms, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi internet access. The area surrounding Hotel Edouard VII has much to offer. In addition to the beautiful coast and its beaches, you will find restaurants, shops, museums and casinos. San Sebastien is only a 45-minute drive away.   This is our guests' favourite part of Biarritz, according to independent reviews.   Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.4 for a two-person trip.
